医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家解码控制特定性别器官发育的遗传程序性别特异性特征的发展在哺乳动物中很常见。这些特征源于相应基因程序的激活，而迄今为止，科学界基本上尚未描述过这些基因程序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Scientists-decode-genic-programs-controlling-sex-specific-organ-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Scientists-decode-genic-programs-controlling-sex-specific-organ-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75ade91-3af8-42bd-876f-fcdb8de37777 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:56:24 -0400 Scientists decode genetic programs controlling sex-specific organ development
新报告强调了护理的财务影响根据 TIAA 研究所和宾夕法尼亚大学护理学院 (Penn Nursing) 的一份新报告，许多人忽视了财务护理的短期和长期成本，这是财务顾问和雇主可以帮助解决的一个日益严重的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-report-highlights-the-financial-impact-of-caregiving.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-report-highlights-the-financial-impact-of-caregiving.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9b32767-bf26-4448-b514-4310af3a7e75 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:32:01 -0400 New report highlights the financial impact of caregiving
塔夫茨大学的研究人员探索衰老科学抗皱霜、让你保持年轻的超级食品、承诺改善记忆力的膳食补充剂、可以永远自我更新的“不朽”细胞——在我们的商店和媒体上，关于衰老的说法比比皆是。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Tufts-researchers-explore-the-science-of-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Tufts-researchers-explore-the-science-of-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d90cbea-2d95-4951-ba39-d32c6c71a2c7 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:26:45 -0400 Tufts researchers explore the science of aging
研究发现，七分之一的美国人长期感染新冠病毒伦敦大学学院和达特茅斯学院的学者对长期感染新冠病毒和症状流行情况进行了大规模调查，称到 2022 年底，美国有七分之一的人患有长期感染新冠病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/One-in-seven-Americans-have-had-long-Covid-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/One-in-seven-Americans-have-had-long-Covid-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fac71529-9568-4bad-9c28-6bbcb113dce8 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:21:27 -0400 One in seven Americans have had long Covid, study finds
COVID-19 大流行可能会阻碍减少牙科护理中阿片类药物使用的努力一项新的研究显示，如今在美国接受拔牙或其他痛苦牙科手术的美国人获得阿片类止痛药的可能性比几年前要小得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/COVID-19-pandemic-may-have- thrown-a-wrench-in-efforts-to-reduce-opioid-use-in-dental-care。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/COVID-19-pandemic-may-have- thrown-a-wrench-in-efforts-to-reduce-opioid-use-in-dental-care。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c28dd1f-4eb4-4daf-bf70-6bac489aad04 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:17:29 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic may have thrown a wrench in efforts to reduce opioid use in dental care
科学家确定神经元通讯中关键蛋白质的结构神经元使用称为神经递质的化学信号相互交谈。圣裘德儿童研究医院的科学家利用结构生物学专业知识来确定囊泡单胺转运蛋白 2 (VMAT2) 的结构，这是神经元通讯的关键组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Scientists-define-struct-of-key- Protein-in-neuronal-communication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Scientists-define-struct-of-key- Protein-in-neuronal-communication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45163ceb-c0ba-4c45-bb07-e09a11a871d8 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:11:11 -0400 Scientists determine structure of key protein in neuronal communication
合成黑色素霜可治愈皮肤损伤并促进修复想象一下，当您的皮肤暴露在阳光或环境毒素下时，有一种护肤霜可以治愈全天发生的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Synthetic-melanin-cream-heals-skin-damage-and-promotes-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Synthetic-melanin-cream-heals-skin-damage-and-promotes-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d6bf063-ef30-4f94-b290-87ae96547cfd Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:53:00 -0400 Synthetic melanin cream heals skin damage and promotes repair
新型病毒诊断设备只需三分钟即可给出实验室质量的结果巴斯大学的工程师发明了一种病毒诊断设备，只需三分钟即可给出实验室质量的结果，他们将其描述为“世界上最快的新冠测试”​​。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-virus-diagnosis-device-gives-lab-quality-results-within-just-tri-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-virus-diagnosis-device-gives-lab-quality-results-within-just-tri-millions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf3ac8a-54bd-4c15-af00-caa433b620f5 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:47:00 -0400 New virus diagnosis device gives lab-quality results within just three minutes
LHPP 基因被确定为治疗难治性抑郁症的潜在靶点重度抑郁症 (MDD) 是一种普遍存在的心理健康状况，对许多人来说是一种致残的疾病。人们很早就认识到 MDD 具有遗传和环境影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/LHPP-gene-identified-as-a-potential-target-for-treatment-pressive-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/LHPP-gene-identified-as-a-potential-target-for-treatment-pressive-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=788345c1-36b3-46c3-a4c5-b1bb11768bfb Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:40:00 -0400 LHPP gene identified as a potential target for treatment-resistant depression
发现阿司匹林抗癌特性的新机制慕尼黑大学的研究人员发现了阿司匹林可以抑制结直肠癌的信号通路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-mechanism-discovered-for-aspirins-cancer-fighting-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-mechanism-discovered-for-aspirins-cancer-fighting-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e303076f-1ade-4dda-9574-139f9d7ff5df Thu, 02 Nov 2023 15:36:00 -0400 New mechanism discovered for aspirin's cancer-fighting properties
